Working with Settings Menu

The Setting menu comprises of the About link, Reset License link, and Logout link.

 1. In the header area, click Settings a drop-down menu appears.

Figure 9-1 Settings

Table 9-1 Settings UI Options

UI Options

Description

About

Click to display the version and copyright information corresponding to the UCS Accelerated Deployment Assistant.

Logout

Click to logout from UCS Accelerated Deployment Assistant.
